name: Sunway Hospitality Club
description:
# Sunway Hospitality Club

## 🍽 Serving Excellence
For students pursuing or passionate about hospitality, tourism, and service management.

## 🎓 Activities
- Hotel and restaurant field visits
- Event planning and catering experiences
- Skill-building workshops in F&B and guest services

## 🤵 Elevate Your Skills
Get real-world insights and experiences that will serve you for life.
